original_text: There was also a poor man called Lazarus. He had sores all over his body. He lay outside the gate of the rich man.
korean_text: 그런데 나사로라 이름하는 한 거지가 헌데 투성이로 그의 대문 앞에 버려진 채

sentences.original_text: There was also a poor man called Lazarus
He had sores all over his body
He lay outside the gate of the rich man
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 부자의 문 바깥에 누워 있었다
